summary: dmaengine: ti: k3-udma: Do conditional decrement of UDMA_CHAN_RT_PEER_BCNT_REG
details:
dmaengine: ti: k3-udma: Do conditional decrement of UDMA_CHAN_RT_PEER_BCNT_REG

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 8aa234b1a492382874545f3b1be81147e88f0db5, it was introduced in version v6.1 by commit 7c94dcfa8fcff2dba53915f1dabfee49a3df8b88. For more details please see the references link.
